reviewText: I hate tests. Paco de Lucia didn't knew theory, he only practiced since he was a very young boy same as I did. I want to be able to play the guitar as a professional. I felt like I was in college. I already won a national contest and didn't had to go through any written nor oral test of any kind. People don't go to concerts to see if you know in which scale you're playing, that's boring. I hate tests and theory. I'll write my own music and make a concert this year with the knowledge I already have. I hate school tests.
